entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow later this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
